Package com.example.sphinxevents

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.sphinxevents.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
This class manages interactions with a Firebase Firestore database and Firebase Storage. It provides methods for handling data storage, retrieval, and other operations related to user, facility, and event management.

    • DatabaseManager

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static DatabaseManager getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of DatabaseManager
      Returns:
      the DatabaseManager instance

    • createEvent

      public void createEvent(Event event, DatabaseManager.EventCreationCallback callback)
      Creates a new event in the Firestore database.
      Parameters:
      event - The event object containing details to be stored.
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure of the event creation.

    • saveUser

      public void saveUser(Entrant user, DatabaseManager.UserCreationCallback callback)
      Adds a new user to the Firestore database.
      Parameters:
      user - The Entrant object containing user details.
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure of the user creation.

    • getUser

      public void getUser(String deviceId, DatabaseManager.UserRetrievalCallback callback)
      Retrieves a user from the Firestore database using the users device ID
      Parameters:
      deviceId - The device ID of the user
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure of user retrieval

    • retrieveEntrantList

      public void retrieveEntrantList(ArrayList<String> entrantsToRetrive, DatabaseManager.retrieveEntrantListCallback callback)
      Retrieves entrants that match an ArrayList of entrant id's Used for displaying entrants in home screen
      Parameters:
      entrantsToRetrive - list of entrant id's to search for in database
      callback - callback to handle success or failure of entrants list retrieval

    • addFacility

      public void addFacility(String deviceId, Facility facility, DatabaseManager.FacilityCreationCallback callback)
      Adds a facility to the database
      Parameters:
      deviceId - device ID of organizer, key for facility in database
      facility - facility to add to database
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure of adding facility

    • getFacility

      public void getFacility(String deviceId, DatabaseManager.facilityRetrievalCallback callback)
      Retrieves a facility from the database
      Parameters:
      deviceId - device ID of organizer, key of facility in database
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure of facility retrieval

    • removeFacility

      public void removeFacility(String deviceId, DatabaseManager.FacilityRemovalCallback callback)
      Removes a facility from the database, deletes associated events, their posters, and updates the user who owns the facility.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - The ID of the facility and its associated user.
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure of the facility removal process.

    • searchFacility

      public void searchFacility(String query, DatabaseManager.FacilitySearchCallback callback)
      Searches database for facilities that match name
      Parameters:
      query - the facility name to find in database
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure of searching database

    • isUserAdministrator

      public void isUserAdministrator(String userId, DatabaseManager.IsAdminCallback callback)
      Checks if a user deviceId is in the administrators collection
      Parameters:
      userId - The deviceId of the user to check.
      callback - A callback to handle the result (true if admin, false otherwise).

    • uploadProfilePicture

      public void uploadProfilePicture(String deviceId, android.net.Uri pfpUri, DatabaseManager.UploadProfilePictureCallback callback)
      Uploads a profile picture to Firebase Storage.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - The device ID of the user for whom the profile picture is being uploaded.
      pfpUri - URI of the profile picture to upload
      callback - Callback to handle success of failure of the upload.

    • deleteProfilePicture

      public void deleteProfilePicture(String deviceId, DatabaseManager.DeleteProfilePictureCallback callback)
      Deletes a profile picture from Firebase Storage and updates the user's profilePictureUrl to an empty string.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - The device ID of the user whose profile picture is being deleted.
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure of the deletion.

    • getEvent

      public void getEvent(String eventID, DatabaseManager.eventRetrievalCallback callback)
      Retrieves a event from the database
      Parameters:
      eventID - ID of event, key of events in database
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure of event retrieval

    • joinEventWaitingList

      public void joinEventWaitingList(String userId, UserLocation userLocation, String eventId, DatabaseManager.joinWaitingListCallback callback)
      Adds user to the waiting list of an event Adds event into user's pendingEvents array Stores user location in event if geolocation was required
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user joining the waiting list
      userLocation - the location of the user, null if geolocation wasn't required
      eventId - the id of the event
      callback - the callback to handle success or failure of the operation

    • getUserLocations

      public void getUserLocations(String eventId, DatabaseManager.getUserLocationsCallback callback)
      Obtains the locations of entrants of an event
      Parameters:
      eventId - the ID of the event to retrieve locations for
      callback - the callback to handle success or failure

    • joinEvent

      public void joinEvent(String userID, String eventID)
      Adds Id of entree to entrants field of event
      Parameters:
      userID - ID of user being added
      eventID - ID of event being updated

    • leaveEvent

      public void leaveEvent(String userID, String eventID)
      Removes userID from list of entrants in events document Removes EventID from list of pendingEvents in users document
      Parameters:
      userID - ID of user being removed
      eventID - ID of event being removed

    • confirmEvent

      public void confirmEvent(String userID, String eventID)
      Adds userId to confirmed array of event and moves eventId from pending to joined events in user document
      Parameters:
      userID - ID of user being added
      eventID - ID of event being updated

    • cancelEvent

      public void cancelEvent(String userID, String eventID)
      Removes userId to winners array of Event and removes eventId from pendingEvents in user document
      Parameters:
      userID - ID of user being added
      eventID - ID of event being updated

    • updateLotteryWasDrawn

      public void updateLotteryWasDrawn(String eventID)
      Updates bool lotteryWasDrawn to true, called when the lottery is drawn by organizer.
      Parameters:
      eventID - ID of event being updated.

    • updateEventWinners

      public void updateEventWinners(String eventID, ArrayList<String> winners)
      Updates the winner array of given event
      Parameters:
      winners - ID of users who won the lottery.
      eventID - ID of event being updated.

    • updateRedrawUserCount

      public void updateRedrawUserCount(String eventID, Integer count)
      Updates the total count of redrawn users.
      Parameters:
      count - The total count.
      eventID - ID of event being updated.

    • updateEntrants

      public void updateEntrants(String eventID, ArrayList<String> entrants)
      Updates the entrants array of the event class.
      Parameters:
      entrants - ID of users who will be in the updated array.
      eventID - ID of event being updated.

    • updateOrganizerCreatedEvents

      public void updateOrganizerCreatedEvents(String userID, String eventID)
      Adds Id of new created event to createdEvents field of user with userID
      Parameters:
      userID - The user who created the event
      eventID - The event that is been uploaded

    • changeEventPoster

      public void changeEventPoster(String eventId, String posterId, android.net.Uri posterUri, DatabaseManager.changeEventPosterCallback callback)
      Changes the poster of an event Uploads poster, updates poster field for event
      Parameters:
      eventId - the ID of the event to change the poster for
      posterId - the path of the poster in the database
      posterUri - the Uri of the new poster
      callback - the callback to handle success or failure of changing poster

    • retrieveEventList

      public void retrieveEventList(ArrayList<String> eventsToRetrieve, String userId, String eventType, DatabaseManager.retrieveEventListCallback callback)
      Retrieves events that match an ArrayList of event id's Used for displaying events in home screen
      Parameters:
      eventsToRetrieve - list of event id's to search for in database
      callback - callback to handle success or failure of event list retrieval

    • getJoinedEvents

      public void getJoinedEvents(String userID, DatabaseManager.getJoinedEventsCallback callback)

    • createNotification

      public void createNotification(Notification notification, ArrayList<String> recipients, DatabaseManager.NotificationCreationCallback callback)
      Adds notification to the "notifications" sub-collection of recipients.
      Parameters:
      notification - The notification object being uploaded.
      recipients - The recipients of the notification.
      callback - Callback function on whether upload succeeded or faulted.

    • getNotifications

      public void getNotifications(String userID, DatabaseManager.getNotificationsCallback callback)
      Gets ArrayList of Notification objects sent to userID
      Parameters:
      userID - The list of the user to retrieve notifications for
      callback - Success or Failure callback

    • searchProfiles

      public void searchProfiles(String query, DatabaseManager.ProfilesSearchCallback callback)
      Searches database for users that match name
      Parameters:
      query - the profile name to find in database
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure of searching database

    • removeProfile

      public void removeProfile(String deviceId, DatabaseManager.ProfileRemovalCallback callback)
      Removes a user profile from database
      Parameters:
      deviceId - key for profile
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure of profile deletion

    • searchEvents

      public void searchEvents(String query, DatabaseManager.EventsSearchCallback callback)
      Searches database for events that match name
      Parameters:
      query - the event name to find in database
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure of searching database

    • removeEvent

      public void removeEvent(String eventId, DatabaseManager.EventRemovalCallback callback)
      Removes an event from database
      Parameters:
      eventId - key for event
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure of event deletion

    • cancelEntrant

      public void cancelEntrant(String eventId, String userId, DatabaseManager.CancelEntrantCallback callback)
      Cancels an entrant from participation in an event
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to cancel entrant from
      userId - The ID of the user to be cancelled
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure of entrant cancellation

    • removeQR

      public void removeQR(String eventId, DatabaseManager.QRRemovalCallback callback)
      Removes QR code from database
      Parameters:
      eventId - key for event
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure of QR deletion
